title: Apple releases watchOS 8.4.1 for Apple Watch Series 4 and later
content:
Following the release of watchOS 8.4 last week, Apple today is rolling out watchOS 8.4.1 to some Apple Watch users. That’s because the update seems to be exclusive to Apple Watch Series 4 and later.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.4.1 for Apple Watch Series 4 and later appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: It's unclear what exactly changes with the update, but the release notes say that watchOS 8.4.1 comes to fix bugs.
